=== Current Issues ===
To get the wifi LED working and to eliminate firmware errors, add the following to /etc/modprobe.d/ipw2200 (Sources: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.20/+bug/55780/comments/10|1]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=409921&postcount=8|2]]</nowiki>):

''Note: Wifi works without these modifications, however the first option enables the LED, while the second prevents certain hardware crypto-related firmware errors.''

<pre>
options ipw2200 led=1 hwcrypto=0
</pre>
